nodes.documentation:
@title AllowanceCrowdsale
@dev Extension of Crowdsale where tokens are held by a wallet, which approves an allowance to the crowdsale.
nodes.name: AllowanceCrowdsale

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "AllowanceCrowdsale: token wallet is the zero address"

arguments.value: AllowanceCrowdsale: token wallet is the zero address

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "AllowanceCrowdsale: token wallet is the zero address"

nodes.documentation:
@dev Constructor, takes token wallet address.
@param tokenWallet Address holding the tokens, which has approved allowance to the crowdsale.
@return the address of the wallet that will hold the tokens.
nodes.name: tokenWallet

devdoc.details: Extension of Crowdsale where tokens are held by a wallet, which approves an allowance to the crowdsale.

buyTokens(address).details: low level token purchase ***DO NOT OVERRIDE*** This function has a non-reentrancy guard, so it shouldn't be called by another `nonReentrant` function.

params.tokenWallet: Address holding the tokens, which has approved allowance to the crowdsale.

rate().return: the number of token units a buyer gets per wei.

remainingTokens().details: Checks the amount of tokens left in the allowance.
remainingTokens().return: Amount of tokens left in the allowance

tokenWallet().return: the address of the wallet that will hold the tokens.

wallet().return: the address where funds are collected.

devdoc.title: AllowanceCrowdsale
